title: Kevin Kaufman and Wendy Kale Endowed Scholarship Fund
description:
To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for students enrolled
in the College of Media, Communication and Information at the University of Colorado Boulder. Scholarships will be merit-based
and need-based.
marketingContent: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for students enrolled in the College of Media, Communication and Information at the University of Colorado Boulder. Scholarships will be merit-based and need-based.
